info.name: Tree Style Tab custom & fix
info.description:
For Tree Style Tab addon users:
https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/tree-style-tab/

No more scrollbar flash out when close tabs, and slim splitter.
info.additionalInfo:
2014.06.13: firefox 30
2014.05.04: updated for firefox v29, add borders for faviconized tabs.
